sense.def:
A corner
je kraj, kjer se stikata dve stranici ali robova nečesa.

seg.quote: ...a television set in the corner of the room.

sense.def:
A corner
je tudi kraj, kjer cesta ostro zavije ali se sreča z drugo cesto.

seg.quote: There's a telephone box on the corner.

sense.def:
To corner a person or animal
pomeni spraviti osebo ali žival v kraj ali položaj, iz katerega ne more pobegniti.

seg.quote: The police and cornered the wrong car.
She had me cornered between the front porch and her car.

sense.def:
To corner a market or other area of activity
pomeni dobiti oblast nad tržiščem ali nekim drugim področjem dejavnosti, tako da se to ne more posrečiti nikomur drugemu.

To be in a corner
pomeni biti v težavnem položaju;

To cut corners
pomeni nekaj hitro narediti, tako da je narejeno manj natančno, kot bi moralo biti.
